channel.title: Islandminers: (1.6.2) Factions, Hunger games, The Walls, CTF, Mob arena, + MORE
channel.description:
[b]HELLO FELLOW APPLE SLICES! [/b]
This is an new server with very few visitors. I need your help to get the word out about it, Join our small group of extreamly friendly people. There are VERY few rules and just have fun. Grief protection, there is even a plugin that stops creeper explosions from destroying your land. Also [b]NO WHITE-LIST CRACKED SERVER![/b]
This server is adding more games day by day so come on and enjoy it in its early stages. Taking game suggestions. On this server you wont get bored, there is parkour, pvp arenas, mob arenas, tones of stuff to do with your friends. There are also smaller games like checkers and battleship so feel free to play whatever you want.
[b]Since this server is cracked, we put plugins on to protect your account so no one logs in as you on the server.[/b] [u]All you need to do when you join is just flow the on-screen instructions upon joining. Simply do /register <password> etc. Just follow what it says. Its a simple login protection. [/u] Also none cracked users can also go on, if you didn't already know.
[b]IP:[/b] islandminers-mc.servegame.com Thanks in advance for joining and believing in the successes in this epic server.
